## ASTNode.createWorkspaceNode() method

Creates an AST node pointing to a workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static createWorkspaceNode(workspace: Workspace | null, wsCoordinate: Coordinate | null): ASTNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) \| null | The workspace that we are on. |
|  wsCoordinate | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) \| null | The position on the workspace for this node. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) \| null

An AST node pointing to a workspace and a position on the workspace.
